mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT g.GROUP_NO AS "groupNo", g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG AS "groupMainImg", g.GROUP_NAME AS "groupName", g.GROUP_INTRODUCE AS "groupIntroduce", c.CATEGORY_NAME AS "categoryName", COUNT(DISTINCT mg.MEMBER_NO) AS "currentPopulation", g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION AS "maxPopulation" FROM "GROUP" g JOIN MEMBER_GROUP mg ON g.GROUP_NO = mg.GROUP_NO JOIN CATEGORY c ON g.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE mg.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N' AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND g.GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY g.GROUP_NO, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT mg.MEMBER_NO) / g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION < 1 ORDER BY g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION / COUNT(mg.MEMBER_NO) ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 9

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT g.GROUP_NO AS "groupNo", g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG AS "groupMainImg", g.GROUP_NAME AS "groupName", g.GROUP_INTRODUCE AS "groupIntroduce", c.CATEGORY_NAME AS "categoryName", COUNT(DISTINCT mg.MEMBER_NO) AS "currentPopulation", g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION AS "maxPopulation", MAX(ch.CHAT_WRITE_DATE) AS "latestChatDate" FROM "GROUP" g JOIN MEMBER_GROUP mg ON g.GROUP_NO = mg.GROUP_NO JOIN CATEGORY c ON g.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO JOIN CHAT ch ON g.GROUP_NO = ch.GROUP_NO WHERE mg.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N' AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND g.GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY g.GROUP_NO, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION ORDER BY MAX(ch.CHAT_WRITE_DATE) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 9

SELECT g.GROUP_NO AS groupNo, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG AS groupMainImg, g.GROUP_NAME AS groupName, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE AS groupIntroduce, c.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION AS maxPopulation, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT mg2.MEMBER_NO) FROM MEMBER_GROUP mg2 WHERE mg2.GROUP_NO = g.GROUP_NO AND mg2.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N' AND mg2.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N') AS currentPopulation FROM "GROUP" g JOIN CATEGORY c ON g.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE g.GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MEMBER_GROUP mg WHERE mg.GROUP_NO = g.GROUP_NO AND mg.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N') GROUP BY g.GROUP_NO, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION

SELECT g.GROUP_NO AS groupNo, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG AS groupMainImg, g.GROUP_NAME AS groupName, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE AS groupIntroduce, c.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, COUNT(DISTINCT mg.MEMBER_NO) AS currentPopulation, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION AS maxPopulation FROM "GROUP" g JOIN MEMBER_GROUP mg ON g.GROUP_NO = mg.GROUP_NO JOIN CATEGORY c ON g.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE g.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N' AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND g.GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY g.GROUP_NO, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION

SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, m.MEMBER_IMG AS memberImg, mg.GROUP_NO AS groupNo FROM MEMBER m JOIN MEMBER_GROUP mg ON m.MEMBER_NO = mg.MEMBER_NO WHERE mg.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N' AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N'
) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
